info.senderName: NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 28 at 3:32PM MDT until September 28 at 5:30PM MDT by NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.description:
* WHAT...Arroyo and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...Central Hudspeth County in West Texas.
* WHEN...Until 530 PM MDT.
* IMPACTS...Water over roadways. Overflowing poor drainage areas. Some low-water crossings may become impassable.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 332 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated widespread heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause arroyo and small stream flooding, which may last for a few hours as runoff makes its way into arroyos and washes.. Between 1 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that may experience flooding include... Sunset Ranches. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
Remain alert for flooding even in locations not receiving rain. Arroyos, streams, and rivers can become raging killer currents in a matter of minutes, even from distant rainfall.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM MDT THIS AFTERNOON
